roleset.name: start up, begin anew
roleset.note: BUD-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bud' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from bud.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: She has indeed turned Hochiminh City Food into a budding conglomerate, but the company itself remains state-owned.

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: The cold snap disrupted the flower's budding.
